job description:
Marketing Data Scientist
If you are a Marketing Analytics Scientist with experience, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
We are an online pet goods retailer committed to promoting healthy pets and healthier pet-owner relationships! Having been around since the new millennium we are focused on growth and capturing market share!

What You Will Be Doing
Monitor KPIs using web reporting tools in order to optimize marketing efforts and measurements.
Use analytics to create actionable recommendations for the marketing team.
Perform short-term and ad-hoc analyses.
Actively be involved in the design, set up, and evaluation of A/B testing procedures.
Create and maintain the distribution of web analytics reports to provide insights to support senior management with decision making.

What You Need for this Position
Experience and knowledge of:
  • Omniture
  • Google Analytics
  • A/B Testing
  • Web Analytics
  • Marketing
  • Finance
  • Statistics
  • Multivariate Testing
  • Data Science
What's In It for You
Competitive compensation including benefits.
Veterinarian discounts.
Bring your pet to work days.
Large and furnished game/break rooms.
High tech working environment.

So, if you are a Marketing Data Scientist with experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
